options.label: Make Circle Smaller
options.description: Shrink the circle to make standing harder

options.label: Make Circle Larger
options.description: Expand the circle to make standing easier

options.label: Send KFC
options.description: Send a bucket of KFC to the player (distraction)

options.label: Send Shawarma
options.description: Send a shawarma combo to the player

options.label: Send Burger King
options.description: Send a BK meal to the player

options.label: Stand on One Foot
options.description: Force the player to stand on one foot instead of two
